Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What sustainable or environmental practices have been implemented?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
The company has implemented several sustainable and environmentally friendly practices throughout their operations. Some notable examples include:

1. Cultivating under cover crops with drip irrigation on their property located south of Quito, Ecuador. This helps reduce water consumption while promoting healthy soil.

2. Using natural insecticidal mixtures such as garlic, onion, chili peppers, and other organic materials instead of chemical pesticides to control pests and diseases.

3. Rotating crops frequently to prevent the occurrence of pests and promote overall plant health.

4. Creating eco-friendly traps using natural ingredients like neem oil, eucalyptus essential oil, and other biological substances to manage pest populations without resorting to harmful chemicals.

5. Formulating their green savon

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What environmental impact metrics are reported?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
The article mentions several environmental impact metrics related to their company and products. These include:

1. Elimination of plastic packaging (reducción del embalaje plástico) by creating detergent tablets instead of conventional plastic-packaged detergents. This reduces the amount of plastic used in their product, contributing to waste reduction.
2. Compatibility with septic systems (compatibilidad con sistemas sépticos), ensuring that their biodegradable detergent does not harm the environment or public health when released into waterways through septic tanks.
3. Containment of phosphates (contiene fosfatos), which can contribute to eutrophication (crecimiento rápido de plantas acuáticas) in bodies of water if released into them. By avoiding the use of phosphates, they help reduce the risk of harmful algae blooms and other negative effects on aquatic ecosystems.

Commerce & Products.question: What products, services, or technologies are available?
Commerce & Products.result:
At Organic Life®, we offer a wide range of organic and natural products for your daily needs. Our product line includes:

1. Skincare: We provide various skincare items such as facial cleansers, toners, serums, moisturizers, sunscreen, and more. All our skincare products are formulated with high-quality, naturally derived ingredients to nourish and protect your skin.

1. Haircare: For healthier hair, we offer shampoos, conditioners, hair treatments, and styling products made from plant-based ingredients that promote hydration, strength, and vitality. Our hair care products are free from harsh chemicals and synthetic fragrances, ensuring they are gentle on your scalp and hair.

1. Bodycare: Our bodycare collection consists of soaps, shower gels, lotions, and butters crafted using natural ingredients like shea butter, coconut oil, and essential oils. These products are designed to nurture and pamper your skin, leaving it soft, supple, and delightfully scented.

1. Personal Care: We also offer a variety of personal care items, including toothpaste, mouthwash, deodorant, and feminine care products. Made with natural and sustainable materials, these products are kind to your body while still providing effective performance.

In addition to our product line, we provide services such as consultations, workshops, and online resources to help educate customers about organic living and the benefits of using natural products. To stay updated on our latest news, offers, and new product launches, be sure to sign up for our newsletter.
